original_title: PWG: An Inch Longer Than Average
overview: 1. The Ballard Brothers (Shane & Shannon Ballard) & Top Gun Talwar vs. "Photogenic" Chris Bosh, Lil' Cholo, & TJ Perkins  2. Jardi Frantz vs. MDogg 20  3. "Classic" Colt Cabana vs. "Scrap Iron" Adam Pearce  6. CM Punk vs. Samoa Joe  Pro Wrestling Guerrilla World Championship Title Match  7. "The Future" Frankie Kazarian (c) vs. "American Dragon"  Bryan Danielson
title: PWG: An Inch Longer Than Average
